evening.name: Evening notifications
evening.title: GAME LIFE
messages: Did you gain levels today? Don't forget to note it in the app!
Did you do any activities today? Don't forget to note it in the app!
Did you gain experience today? Don't forget to note it in the app!
Did you learn something new today? Don't forget to write it down in the app!
Hey, it's almost the end of the day, did you remember to enter your activities?

message.half-time: You have half the time left to complete the task[s]: {}
message.last-time: The following task[s] are due tomorrow: {}, so hurry up and finish them!
message.today-time: The following task[s] are finished today: {}, hurry up and finish them!

server.alert-tokenexpired-text: The application will close, please restart it.

server.alert-error-text: An error has occurred, please try again later.

onboarding.page1: Welcome to Game-Life, the logbook that turns you into a video game character!
onboarding.page2: Note your activities in the application to increase your avatar's experience and level!
onboarding.page3: Deviens meilleur chaque jour, seul ou avec tes amis !

conditions.St: Wait for level {} with the statistic "{}"

activity.alert-remove-text: Are you sure you want to eliminate this activity?
activity.alert-wrongtiming-text: The selected activity how or ends during another.
activity.alert-remcomment-text: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?
activity.timeralert-cancel-text: Are you sure you want to cancel this activity?
activity.timeralert-tooshort-text: You cannot add an activity of less than 15 minutes
activity.display-fail-text: We're sorry but adding the activity failed (status: {})

dailyquest.daily-define-text: Enter 2 categories in which you want to improve
dailyquest.quest-main-text: One hour and a half of activity in the following categories:
dailyquest.quest-bonus-text: One quarter hour in the following category:
dailyquest.alert-info-text:
Daily quests are a way for you to get extra experience.

There are 3 categories in the daily quests:


1- The hour and a half of activity: you have 1h30 of "mandatory" activity per day.
1 hour of activity of your choice, you can choose to complete this hour by doing 1 or 2 activities (of different categories).
If you complete your hour of activity, you gain +1% of xp for the next day (can be accumulated 21 times)
If you fail, you will get -5% of xp for the next day (not cumulative)


2- (Finished soon) A list of habits you want to start / continue.
You can decide to add up to 5 habits at the same time.
If you achieve your quarter of an hour of activity taken at random, you gain +0,5% of xp for the next day (cumulative 10 times)
If you fail, nothing happens.


3- (Available soon) A button to watch a commercial. Watching one earns you points (and later virtual currency). You can earn titles and other bonuses from a certain number of ads watched!
dailyquest.alert-same-text: You cannot choose the same skill twice
dailyquest.alert-warn-text: You can only change the skills for the daily quests once a day
dailyquest.alert-tasknotitle-text: Please enter a title for your task
dailyquest.alert-taskremove-text: You have already checked this task, press no to uncheck it, or yes to delete it

home.alert-maintenance-text:
The servers are in maintenance, you can access the application, but online features are temporarily disabled.

Thank you for your patience, everything will come back to normal in a few minutes!
home.alert-error-text: An error has occurred, please try again later.
home.alert-update-text: An update of the application is available
home.alert-newversion-text: You are on a version not available to the public, the online features are disabled until the official release
home.alert-exit-text: Do you want to leave the application?
home.alert-dateerror-text: It seems that you changed the date, maybe in order to cheat? I hope it won't happen again ^^

leaderboard.alert-onlineneed-text: A connection is required to access the ranking!
leaderboard.alert-connectneed-text: To appear in the ranking, log in by entering your email address in the 'Identity' page.

login.page-text: Hello to you, player of your own life, come and join the LVL-UP community
login.input-cgu-text: I have read and agree to the %terms and conditions%.
login.error-login-nonmail: Please enter a valid email address.
login.error-signin-pseudoUsed: This username is already in use.
login.error-signin-pseudoIncorrect: This username is incorrect (4-24 characters, no insults...).
login.error-signin-disagree: Please accept the terms and conditions.
login.alert-limitAccount-text: You can't create more than 3 accounts with one device.
login.alert-limitDevice-title: Too many devices on this account
login.alert-limitDevice-text: You can't have more than 5 devices connected to a single account.
login.alert-deviceRemoved-text: Your device has been removed from your account because you already have the maximum number of devices on this account.

shop.alert-code-text:
You can win codes by:
	- Playing on our Discord server
	- Finding codes in our Tiktok and Youtube videos
	- Winning a contest on Instagram or Twitter
shop.popup-notenoughox-text: You don't have enough Ox to buy this item.

shop.reward-failed-text: An error has occurred, please retry again later.
shop.reward-wrong-text: The code you entered is incorrect.
shop.reward-success-text: You have obtained the following rewards:

skills.text-empty: Add an activity, the associated skills will appear here

descriptions.int: Intelligence is a very broad statistic, as soon as you use your brain, you train it and therefore gain intelligence points. The main skills to gain intelligence are school work and thinking work.
descriptions.soc: Social competence is a skill that increases when you do activities with other people. For example, team sports or going out with friends.
descriptions.for: Strength is a fairly simple statistic, it increases by doing skills that require it, like bodybuilding, sports or physical jobs for example!
descriptions.end: Stamina is probably the skill that you will improve the fastest! This is a key statistic that improves in almost all sports!
descriptions.agi: Agility is probably the longest statistic to build, it is not often required and improves slowly, the best ways to increase your agility are actis like stretching or yoga.
descriptions.dex: Dexterity is the agility of the fingers, so it improves a lot on precision tasks, writing tasks on a computer or even with musical instruments.

wait.wait-email-text:
An email has been sent to you to authorize your device to connect.

The email may be sent after a few minutes, check your spam.

main.home-1: Hi! I hope you're well. I'm going to introduce you to the applications, follow me!
main.home-2: At the top right you can see your avatar, which you can click on to see your profile
main.profile-1: This is your profile, where you can modify your personal information
main.profile-2: This is your avatar, you can click on it to change your appearance
main.home-3: Here's the news, starting with a quote chosen by the community and news about the application
main.home-4: This button is used to add the activities you do in real life, you'll see them appear in the calendar and you'll earn experience!
main.home-5: This button also lets you add an activity, so press it to try it out
main.activity-1: You can filter activities by category: {}
main.activity-2: You can select an activity here to open the activity panel
main.home-6: You can also add tasks, to add activities more quickly, or follow personal goals
main.home-7: Come here, let's take a look at the calendar
main.calendar-1: This is where all your activities will appear, you can select them to view their details and edit them.
main.calendar-2: You can select another day or navigate between weeks with the arrows
main.calendar-3: And you can click here to display the month calendar
main.calendar-4: Finally, let's go and see the store!
main.shop-1: At the top you can enter a code to get rewards
main.shop-2: Here you can watch an ad to earn Ox for free (Ox are the app's virtual currency)
main.shop-3: Yan can buy Ox with money (this page will be available in future updates!)
main.shop-4: You can spend your Ox here to buy items, which you can equip in your profile - offers change every day!
main.shop-5: In this category, you can buy chests containing a random item. The rarer the chest, the greater the chance of getting a quality item!
main.shop-no-internet: Unfortunately I cannot present the shop to you because you do not have the internet, but you can access it by being connected!
main.home-8:
That's it! Now I'll let you discover the app for yourself, if you need help you can call me by pressing the help buttons!

Good luck, even if I know you don't need it ;)

achievements.1: This is the success page. Discover all the ones you've already achieved, as well as others that are patiently waiting to be revealed.

activity.1: You can filter activities by category: {}
activity.2: You can select an activity here to open the activity panel
activity.3: You can choose to add an activity you've done or plan to do later, or you can set a timer to start the activity now
activity.4: You can click on this component to define the start and duration of the activity
activity.5: Here you can see the experience you'll gain by doing this activity
activity.6: You can add a comment to your activity, for example, to record your feelings or to note important information

profile.1: This is your profile, you can change your personal information here
profile.2: This is your avatar, you can click on it to change your appearance

shop.dailyDeals: You can spend your Ox here to buy items, which you can equip in your profile - the offers change every day!
shop.randomChests: In this category you can buy chests in which there is a random item, the rare the chest, the more likely you have a quality item!
shop.randomChests-common: For the common trunk, there is a strong chance of obtaining an object of common rarity (90%), a probability of 9% for a rare object, 0.99% for an epic object and only 0.01% for alegendary object.
shop.randomChests-rare: With regard to the rare trunk, the chances of obtaining a common object are 20%, 75% for a rare object, 4.5% for an epic object and 0.5% for a legendary object.
shop.randomChests-epic: As for the epic trunk, it offers 29% chance of obtaining a rare object, 70% for an epic object and 1% for a legendary object;There is no chance to find a common object there.
shop.targetedChests: You can buy targeted chests, in which you are sure you have an item in the category you have chosen!
shop.targetedChests-common: In the common trunk, the chances of obtaining an object of common rarity are extremely high at 99%, followed by 0.9% for a rare object and 0.1% for an epic object;It should be noted that there is no chance of finding a legendary object there.
shop.targetedChests-rare: By opening the rare trunk, you have 27% chance of obtaining a common object, 70% for a rare object, 2.9% for an epic object and a thin chance of 0.1% for a legendary object.
shop.targetedChests-epic: As for the epic trunk, it does not contain common objects and offers 30% chance of obtaining a rare object, 65% for an epic object, and a significant probability of 5% for a legendary object.
shop.dyes: Finally you can modify items that you already have, it costs less than buying new ones!

task.1: Here you can set the deadline for your task, or its frequency if it's a recurring one
task.2: You can link your task to an activity, which will allow you to gain experience by completing it.
task.3: You can also add sub-tasks to your main task, to organize yourself better.
task.4: Finally, you can add a comment to your task, for example, to note your feelings or to record important information.
